dtliExcerpt: "Dec. 24, 9 p.m., Eastern Standard Time" is a phrase "Rent" fans know well. And they have no doubt been yearning to hear those opening words sung again on the New York stage ever since the show's original Broadway run shuttered in 2008. As documentarian Mark Cohen begins shooting without a script, the bohemian epic "Rent" starts rolling Off-Broadway in a reinterpreted version. However, this time there's a working camera and a strobe light.
